column4: age 79. beloved mother of the late philip jr. (lisa)

column14: james philip jp and emily. dear great grandmother of olivia and ryan. fond aunt to beverly wyack. cherished companion of her beloved dog duffy. dear friend to many. funeral wednesday 8:45 a. m. from the richard-midway funeral home 5749 archer ave.
